name: A Death Racer 3D Free: Best Road Battle of All Vehicles
name_original: A Death Racer 3D Free: Best Road Battle of All Vehicles
description:
Death Racer is an adrenaline-filled offroad racing game with awesome classic vehicles, damage, realistic physics and beautiful graphics, exicting game play mechanics and good fun!

Our game combines the offroad racing with weapons, powerups and other interesting elements. Use any means necessary to win: show how badly you want to win!

This game is a real challenge for any race fans. Like all real physics simulators, the CRS is also a competition of vehicles, where you can use certain weapons to have more fun and to achieve the best and most realistic driving possible. It’s a real deal with animals, field, mud, nice graphics, cool veicles, best physics available, and we can guarantee, that you’ll have the best fun ever with any racing game.

Fasten your seatbelt and fight to win!

No inapp purchase, your progress unlocks the levels in carrier mode and you can get all the vehicles in the free ride mode.

Features:
- Addictive Off-road combat racing with all kinds of interesting vehicles (policecar, taxi, military SUV, firetruck etc.)
- Lot of powerups, moving objects and tricky obstacles
- Realistic 3D graphics and playful physical simulation
- Different control methods (device tilting, on screen touch pads)
- Destructable vehicles and surroundings
- Interesting environments , different day-times and weather conditions
